definitions.definition: A rounded stone from a river bed , fit for use as ballast in ships and for paving roads.
Cobblestones viewed as a building or paving material .
examples: The road was paved in cobblestone .

main_definition: ( countable ) A rounded stone from a river bed , fit for use as ballast in ships and for paving roads.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Cobblestones viewed as a building or paving material .
